header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Holiday in Naples, boyfriend problems, relationships, friends, BBC Good Food Show, Christmas presents, housing.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements

body.u: Thursday night was like a complete disaster I picked up li at eight
in the park and ride and she left her phone on the bus
yeah so we had to wait for the next bus to come back and then it wasn't the right bus and it drove straight past and didn't stop and then she made me drive all the way to to try and chase the bus
so we chased the bus it wasn't the right bus and this one actually stopped and we managed to speak to the bus driver

and it wasn't it they didn't have the phone so then I had to drive to Tesco's and she had to get a sim card and she had to borrow my old phone so that was a complete we didn't get back here till like half ten
and she didn't get her phone at all then did she?
no I don't think so like she had to ring her parents and get them all to like cancel the bloody
yeah and then once that had been sorted we got to finally got to Naples

and that was all fine but she you know she's got syndrome? well she was like really tired and she spent the whole week like last week overdoing it and going to London or th like every day and completely overdoing that so she was really tired so she basically slept for the whole of the first day
well the whole of the afternoon of the first like the day we arrived Friday Saturday we walked round Naples which yes she was really nice and went to the castles and the palaces
and you got did you get to Pompe is it Pompeii? is

we did get to Pompeii but really on the Saturday night like we'd wandered round Naples all day and it was a long day don't get me wrong er I was absolutely shattered cos I didn't sleep very well the night before cos snores bless her heart

so I didn't sleep very well anyway and it got to about half past ten and I was like yeah I need to go to sleep now like I'm dying cos we need to get up early she went in the bathroom and cried because she was really tired yeah exactly was banging around until like half eleven then decided to lie in bed and text her boyfriend and I was like what the fuck are you doing?
I had to I was like what are you doing? Ii you're t you're you're upset because you're tired but you're on your phone which is the worst thing for you what what is wrong with you? and then
and like put your fucking phone away
and she was like okay I'm sorry I'm like good put it down cos you don't moan about
yeah don't and then well cos I was like we have to get up early to go to Pompeii and if you're if if you're not up I'm gonna go on my own like
and she was fine and then in the morning she was fine and she got up and we got to Pompeii and that was really really nice
a really good day and the weather was perfect erm although the Italians don't really understand signposting so
we were wandering round Pompeii and it was like there were no signs anywhere so you you didn't know if it was like a bathhouse or a
house or a bakery the only one we knew was was the brothel because there were graphic roman paintings of people having sex all over it
the wall art was very erm
erm so that was so it was really good but then we got back and had a really nice evening and had dinner and then her boyfriend decided
to quote I can't believe you've been disloyal and gone on holiday with somebody who upset me
because back in July I I said to him I hear you're a bit shy

yeah he's like I can't believe you know like you're being so unloyal I can't believe you're on holiday with a bitch who doesn't like me and who upset me and won't even apologise you know you obviously don't care about me if you're choosing her I can't believe you've got to a c a city that I wanted to go to and you've gone to with her and you haven't

yeah exactly and you've gone t er you've gone there with her instead of me you know like she's such a bitch you know like I wouldn't ever go on holiday with somebody who was horrible and upset you so why are you going on holiday with somebody who upset me?
yeah if you dare tell what I've what I've just said I'm gonna break up with you I mean some really horrible stuff like really shit stuff
and I was like this has actually really upset me like your boyfriend has made this like every holiday we've been on
he h your boyfriend has ruined like
Berlin last year Bratislava this weekend like what is his problem? and she's like oh it'll all be okay it'll be fine I was like it's not
llike he just emotionally blackmailed you by saying he'll break up with you if you don't do what he wants
no I was like his behaviour is completely unacceptable
and she like oh yeah no but oh I'm too tired to deal with it now I'll I'll deal with it when I get home it'll be okay I was like
I was like what the fuck? like and she's like oh don't worry like what he says about you don't change my opinion of you at all I was li
yeah I was so you you
you're not gonna say something to him about saying stuff like that?
yeah I she was like well you know like I can see it from his point of view I was like how can you see it from his point of view?
and she's like well no I see how it got misconstrued I was like no no
I don't think anything got miscon
there's nothing misconstruing you out there is there really?
no normal person would react the way he's reacted being called shy

she was like yeah yeah I know but I've explained to him that you were just trying to be nice but you know he just you then didn't talk to him when he arrived I was like why should I? when I met him he was threatening not to come to your birthday I didn't know what to say to him hi did you have a nice morning?
cos obviously you had a shit morning cos you were threatening your girlfriend
like she was like yeah I know like I'll I'll sort it out there must be something wrong with him like really? really?

so controlli I was just like and I just I suppose she was a bit weird with me this morning and I sent her a message when I got to work I was like I don't want this to ruin our like our friendship and I still want us to go on holiday but this is three holidays
he's like he's had a negative effect on and I'm tired of it like if he does it again I will talk to him because I am tired and she's oh no don't talk to him cos he'll get really angry like

probably ruruined it a bit like tainted it

like she doesn't normally she has like like a day or two abroad or something but

because nor he told her she she when we were going round she messaged him in the evening and was like oh it really reminded me of when we went to Rome together it was such a nice holiday and

I'm so glad we did it we'll have to go again some time you know like I'm so looking forward to like going on holiday with you again and having a romantic time he said to her that the thought of her going on holiday and saying those things to him while he was me with while she was with me made her made him feel sick like her
being with me on holiday made him feel sick
she needs to get away from him immediately
